info.author: Uwe Schmitt
info.description:
In comp.lang.python Terry Caroll stated a memory problem when iterating over the
header information of a 4GB tar file. This is because the standard libs tarfile
module caches all header blocks which results in linear memory consumption.  My
module tarfile_scanner solves this problem. Feel free to contact me if you have
some questions.
info.name: tarfile_scanner
info.html_description: In comp.lang.python Terry Caroll stated a memory problem when iterating over the header information of a 4GB tar file. This is because the standard libs tarfile module caches all header blocks which results in linear memory consumption. My module tarfile_scanner solves this problem. Feel free to contact me if you have some questions.
